items.name: Bharli Vangi
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish made by stuffing baby eggplants with a spicy peanut-sesame filling and then cooking them in a tangy tomato onion based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Hirva Vatan Chicken
items.description: A recipe from Maharashtra which uses corriander, mint leaves, ginger, garlic and coconut in the preparation. This gives the dish a unique flavour which is enhanced all the more by the addition of Kasturi Methi.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Moong Dal Bhajiya
items.description: A popular Indian snack made from yellow moong dal (split green gram) batter, seasoned with spices, and deep-fried to golden perfection.

items.name: Palak Dal And Rice
items.description: Lentils cooked with spinach, ginger, garlic and tomatoes and tempered with spices. Served with a portion of rice.

items.name: Achari Paneer Channa Pulao
items.description: Chickpeas and Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion, garlic, ginger and pickling spices mixed with aromatic basmati rice topped with fresh coriander. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Ambur Chicken Briyani
items.description: South Indian style biryani from the region of Ambur. Chicken cooked with onion, tomato, whole spices and ginger-garlic paste; layered with fragrant basmati rice topped with fresh mint and coriander. Served with cucumber yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Dal Pancakes
items.description: Savory lentil batter pancakes spiced with ginger, chilies, and herbs. Perfect for a vegetarian or vegan protein boost

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Veg Triple Schezwan Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that consists of rice stir-fried with a medley of different vegetables (such as carrots, beans, and bell peppers) and spicy Schezwan sauce.
items.extra: make it a meal with a side of veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Triple Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that offers a delightful explosion of flavours. This dish features a combination of mixed vegetables stir-fried with cooked rice, chicken and tossed in a spicy Schezwan sauce. The sauce, known for its robust and fiery taste, adds a tangy and aromatic element to the dish.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy deep fried noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Mushroom Herb Rice
items.description: Savory mushrooms mingle with fragrant herbs in a bed of fluffy rice for a delightful and versatile side dish.

items.name: Bhindi Do Pyaza
items.description: Okra cooked in onion tomato based gravy with freshly ground spices topped with petals of onion and tomato
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Lamb Kaari
items.description: Succulent lamb pieces cooked with a special kaari masala spice mix and coconut milk. This dish is a special among the bori community.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki Chaat
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and topped with a mix of spicy green chutney, sweet & tangy tamarind chutney, yoghurt, pommogranate seeds and sev. (2 tikkis)

items.name: Masoor Dal Pulao
items.description: A nutritious and flavorful one-pot dish made with red lentils (masoor dal) and basmati rice cooked together with aromatic spices, onions, tomatoes, and herbs. This wholesome pulao is perfect for a comforting meal

items.name: Pepper Paneer Masala
items.description: A spicy and flavorful Indian dish made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cubes cooked in a rich, peppery tomato-based gravy, seasoned with aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Chicken Pepper Masala
items.description: A spicy Indian dish featuring succulent chicken pieces cooked in a flavorful gravy with black pepper, onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dabeli
items.description: A snack from the streets of India, with mashed potatoes cooked with tangy and spicy sauces and freahly made dabeli masala stuffed between a bun and smeered with roasted peanuts, sev, pomagranate seeds. (2 dabeli)

items.name: Aloo Pyaz Paratha
items.description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced potato and onion. Served with onion-tomato chutney

items.name: Achari Paneer Masala
items.description: A tangy and spicy Indian dish made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a flavorful gravy infused with pickling spices such as mustard seeds, fennel, fenugreek, and nigella seeds.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Chicken Achari Masala
items.description: A tangy and spicy Indian dish made with chicken cooked in a rich gravy flavored with pickling spices like mustard seeds, fennel, fenugreek, and nigella seeds.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Tamarind Rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Paneer Sabz Dum Biryani
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful Indian dish where paneer (Indian cottage cheese) and mixed vegetables are layered with aromatic basmati rice, then slow-cooked (dum) with a blend of spices. Served with raita + papad + achar.

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb Biryani
items.description: A classic Indian rice dish that is layered with succulent lamb meat and aromatic spices. The meat is marinated in yogurt and spices, and cooked separately with fragrant rice, saffron, and fried onions. The two are then layered together and slow-cooked on low heat, allowing the flavors to blend together perfectly. Served with yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions and lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Chole Chawal
items.description: A popular North Indian dish featuring spicy and tangy chickpea curry (chole) served with basmati rice (chawal). This classic combination offers a hearty and satisfying meal, with the robust flavors of the chickpea curry complementing the fluffy rice.

items.name: Veg Fried Rice
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with veg manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Chicken Fried Rice
items.description: Stir fried chicken and assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with chicken manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Dragon Chicken
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish featuring crispy chicken strips tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce made with soy sauce, chili sauce, garlic, and bell peppers. This flavorful and colorful dish is garnished with sesame seeds and green onions

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.
